item.title: Airport worker accused of monitoring women with GPS trackers faces stalking charges

item.title: Sarasota kindergarten vaccine rates plummet — and doctors fear speaking out

item.title: Body found in pond along I-75 near where missing teen was last seen
item.description: The sheriff's office says a decomposing body was found in a retention pond near I-75 and State Road 70.

item.title: HIGH ALERT: Police hunting for wanted felon
item.description: Venice Police are on the hunt for a wanted felon, and they say the search has been underway all night.
